An intranet is a private network that is only accessible to an organization's employees. It can be a useful tool for sharing information and resources within the organization, including project status reports. One of the main benefits of using an intranet for communication is that it allows the project manager to easily share updates and reports with all team members, regardless of their location. It also provides a central location where team members can access all of the relevant project information and resources.
